Summary: This happened June 24, 2008 in Steuben County, Indiana...
divs: Sighting DetailsThis happened June 24, 2008 between 10:15 and 10:30 pm in Steuben County, Indiana. My sister and I were headed home from our mom's house, going north on CR 225 W near Pleasant Lake, Indiana. About halfway up in the northern sky, right ahead of us, I noticed a bright amber-colored oval-shaped light. At first I thought it was a bright star or planet, but as we drove, it got bigger and we got closer to it. I knew then it was not a star or planet. As we approached the corner of 225 W and 500S, near the Boy Scout Camp, the light turned red suddenly. Then just as suddenly it went out like someone turning out a light bulb. It never re-appeared. It didn't go behind a cloud. It just went out and disappeared. I've looked for it every night since and had no luck. It was the very definition of a UFO - an unidentified flying object. I felt eerie, and knew I had seen something totally out of the ordinary. You want to see one your whole life, then when you do, it's scary! Another thing is this - I too have heard the jet noises and loud booms that have plagued other Hoosiers this spring and summer. One of the booms woke me out of a sound sleep a few weeks ago. I've heard the jet noise while out with my dogs at night - it's like ten jets flying low all at once, then complete silence and nothing to be seen. Not sure if all of this is related or not.
